fsGMNotes.p: Large area for House Harskel
Roads are lined with gems that when removed turn to normal stone. Rich people neighborhood
An iron fortress with towers like blades
Overgrown Ruin mansion that was the house of people that rose against prince rolan
Dwarf Mechancts, very embelished house
Filled with cold fluid that damages 10 every turn holding it and eventually turns to dried blood.
Six different areas that all look slightly different
People live under the docks
For all the Noble houses
Will get thrown out if seen
Bodies of the hanging wall come here and more serous crimes they get stuck in a cage and dorwn.
Looks like a bunch of ships crashed together
Traced with silver and music coming from inside.
Very Busy
Gaurded by gargoyles
Three store building that sells fancy armor and wears
From general stores to specalty shops
For stolen goods
Owned by a dwarf
No expense spared, facy shit everywhere including whores
Big Dome with lights everywhere
Large 5 story building used by the government and vielded legue to look at shit

fsDescription.p: The shadowfell is a bleak realm that houses both the dead and those among the living who have embraced a dismal existence there.

As a shadowy reflection of the world, the Shadowfell can manifest differently to visitors. The plane is an amalgam of differences and similarities to the world. Each person finds something both recognizable and disturbing in its grim landscape.

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 28(3d12 + 10) piercing damage.
id-00001.name: Swift Blade

id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 5ft., three targets. Hit: 28(3d12 + 10) piercing damage.
id-00003.name: Duelist's Flurry

id-00001.name: Prince Rolan

id-00001.desc: Trigger: An enemy within 100ft that is marked makes an attack that doesn't include Rolan as a target.\nTarget Takes 30 necrotic damage and Rolan gains 30 temporary hit points
id-00001.name: Life Siphon

id-00002.desc: Trigger: Rolan drops to 0 HP\nEffect: Rolan does not die, instead falls unconscious until the start of his next turn. when he gains 135 hit points. All effects on him end and he is insubstaintial until the end of his next turn.
id-00002.name: Unnatural Life

id-00001.savingthrows: Str +2, Dex +2, Con +2, Int +2, Wis +2, Cha +2

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 20(2d10 + 10) slashing damage
id-00001.name: Shadowformed Blade

id-00002.desc: The enforcer shifts up to half its movement speed and usees Shadowformed blade. No AoO
id-00002.name: Gloom Stride

id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: DC 19 Constitution Saving Throw, taking 24(4d6 + 12) acid damage and the target is blinded, or half as much damage on a successful one.
id-00001.name: Caustic Bite

id-00001.desc: The enforcer shifts up to its speed and can enter enemies' spaces during this movement. Each time the enforcer enters an enemy's space for the first time during this movement, must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw , taking 14(2d8 + 10) acid damage on a failed save and falls prone and is slowed.
id-00001.name: Dissolving Blitz

id-00001.desc: The enforcer deals 10(2d10) slashing damage extra against any creature granting combat advantage
id-00001.name: Combat Advantage
